articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: No Bing, no Edge, no upselling: De-crufted Windows 11 coming to Europe soon - Ars Technica
articles.description: Some changes will arrive for non-EU users, too, but not the easy removals.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Users in the extended European Economic Area will soon be able to avoid most of the things that feel so exhausting about Windows 11.
75 with 
Using Windows these days means putting up with… [+2999 chars]
